Class Synapse

java.lang.Object
  neuralj.networks.feedforward.Synapse
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Synapse
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents a synapse (the connection between two neurons)

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
 Neuron destination_neuron
          The neuron that's on the end of the synapse
 Neuron source_neuron
          The neuron that's on the start of the synapse
 double value
          The value that is being transmitted throught this synapse: the output from the source neuron.
 double weight
          The synapse's weight
